list.style: margin-top:8px; line-height:1.18; page-break-before:always; font-family:Arial; font-size:11pt; color:#000000;

li.text: Mount the cable chain [1] to the brackets [3] and secure it with the 8 mounting screws [5] provided.
Remove the cable chain crossbars [2] using the flat-tip screwdriver.

para.style: text-align:center; margin-top:8px; margin-bottom:8px; line-height:1.18;

li.text: Insert the cables and hoses into the cable chain [1] according to the layout shown below.

para.style: text-align:center; margin-top:11px; margin-bottom:8px;

para.text: Figure <%HMFIGURECOUNTER3=2%>.<%HMFIGURECOUNTER%> Z-Axis Cable Chain Layout (View A)

li.text: Use the tie wrap plates [4] on both end of the cable chain [1] with cable ties to strap the cables and hoses in order to hold the position firmly and reduce movement inside the cable chain [1].
Fix all crossbars [2] to the cable chain [1].

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: This completes the Z-axis cable chain mounting procedure.
